description: Transform unstructured website content into clean, AI-ready data

actions.name: crawl_website
actions.description: Crawl a website and return structured content from multiple pages.

actions.name: extract_document
actions.description: Extract structured data from documents using vision-capable AI.

actions.name: generate_image
actions.description: Generate images based on a text prompt using AI.

actions.name: scrape_website
actions.description: Scrapes data from a specified URL and format the result.

actions.name: search_news
actions.description: Search for news articles using Google News.

actions.name: web_search
actions.description: Search the web and optionally retrieve content from top results.
